title: x/mobile/exp/audio compilation issue on Mac
body:
I tried to compile the audio example from my mac to build an apk and getting a compilation error due to openAL headers not being available.

```
# golang.org/x/mobile/exp/audio/al
../../exp/audio/al/al_android.go:13:19: fatal error: AL/al.h: No such file or directory
 #include <AL/al.h>
```

Go version (1.6 beta):
`go version devel +8db371b Thu Dec 17 22:45:50 2015 +0000 darwin/amd64` 

OS X: `10.10.5 (14F1021)`

Xcode:
```
xcodebuild -version
Xcode 6.3.2
Build version 6D2105
```
